sentences.en: As grungy as the rock audience may have been, it wanted its music explosively amplified and expertly modulated; it wanted to hear the beat through its pores.
sentences.cn: 尽管摇滚乐的观众可能非常邋遢，摇滚乐仍然力图爆炸式地放大，并精细地调制其声响；它希望能透过毛孔听到节奏。

sentences.en: Captain Gibson sighed explosively and pushed the tablet away.
sentences.cn: 吉布森上校爆发出一阵叹息推开了阅读板.

sentences.en: Green and Pratt employed a rotating - mirror camera with an explosively driven wedge.
sentences.cn: Green和Pratt使用旋转镜头的摄影机,其具有一种爆发性的楔形物.

sentences.en: It reacts explosively with organic material.
sentences.cn: 它与有机材料发生强烈反应.

sentences.en: The sound of her own chewing and swallowing were explosively loud.
sentences.cn: 她自己嚼咽食物的声音非常大。

sentences.en: The virus makes us sneeze or cough explosively.
sentences.cn: 这种病毒会让我们剧烈地咳嗽或打喷嚏.

sentences.en: These transactions grew explosively in the early 1980s.
sentences.cn: 这类交易在20世纪80年代早期迅猛增加。

words.tran_cn: 爆炸了的；分解的；被破除的
爆炸的；爆炸性的；爆发性的
